content.about:
About the deal

An “Italian-Indian” combo isn’t really unfamiliar to you ;). Vgulp presents happy hours all day long at Via Milano, the Italian Restaurant and Lounge, Koramangala. GET 1+1 on select Indian whiskies and other IMFLs. Via Milano is one of the finest Italian fine dine restaurants in Bangalore, and their spotting includes celebrities like “Jonty Rhodes”. So if your stomach is craving Italian, top it up with 1 + 1 offer on select IMFL

  • Offer valid only on all days
  • The Restaurant may get crowded, check in advance
  • 1+1 only available on select IMFL only, check with the restaurant before visit
  • Present your voucher in email on your phone
  • You must be over the legal drinking age in your city to redeem this voucher against drinks/liqour.
  • Cannot be redeemed with cash
  • Please do not print to waste paper, unlessabsolutely necessary
